title: Vvang
author: Vvang
content: I am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.Miners don't buy 3050s so if you want to start mining don't buy one. If you already have one the question is moot,you can try mining with it and observe for yourself. You will be disappointed. Real GPU mining needs a GPU with 8 GB of VRAM or more.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.https://whattomine.com/gpus/73-nvidia-geforce-rtx-3050?cost=0.1&cost_currency=USDThis is a weak video card for mining, it is better to look at more productive models.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.It has the same performance of a AMD Rx 470/480/570/580 for most` of the coins that this card is able to mine profitably,sometimes with a nice Bios mod the Rx versions do like near 3 Mhsh more than this card in Ethash and Etchash algorithms.This clearly means that this is one of the worst cards for mining nowadays and even when it first came so it was,and it mostly geared toward gamers.For just 50-100 dollars more than the price of the 3050 you can buy the 3060 card which makes almost double the performance compared to this card.

comments.author: GEMIN_M4
comments.body: That's a good graphic card for gaming, if you already buy quickly sell back or go back to your store and swap for another, this gpu is not good for crypto mining, not even close so I hope you sell very fast before Ethereum goes pos, at that time I except GPUs to become more cheaper.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on August 07, 2022, 03:51:04 PMQuote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.It has the same performance of a AMD Rx 470/480/570/580 for most` of the coins that this card is able to mine profitably,sometimes with a nice Bios mod the Rx versions do like near 3 Mhsh more than this card in Ethash and Etchash algorithms.This clearly means that this is one of the worst cards for mining nowadays and even when it first came so it was,and it mostly geared toward gamers.For just 50-100 dollars more than the price of the 3050 you can buy the 3060 card which makes almost double the performance compared to this card.I got a few 3060 cards for under 400.three in all for 1085.they do 47+47+47= 141 mh and burn about 330 watts.I have seen a few doing just over 50 mh and 115 watts

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on August 07, 2022, 09:52:31 PMQuote from: swogerino on August 07, 2022, 03:51:04 PMQuote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.It has the same performance of a AMD Rx 470/480/570/580 for most` of the coins that this card is able to mine profitably,sometimes with a nice Bios mod the Rx versions do like near 3 Mhsh more than this card in Ethash and Etchash algorithms.This clearly means that this is one of the worst cards for mining nowadays and even when it first came so it was,and it mostly geared toward gamers.For just 50-100 dollars more than the price of the 3050 you can buy the 3060 card which makes almost double the performance compared to this card.I got a few 3060 cards for under 400.three in all for 1085.they do 47+47+47= 141 mh and burn about 330 watts.I have seen a few doing just over 50 mh and 115 watts That is really a nice price for that card.Where I live which is extremely far away from US the best value is 499 USD for Rtx 3060 right now and I am planning to build a rig with such cards after September when people will panic from Ethereum mining ending and sell their cards in a hurry,I believe in such moment it is where I should act and buy one such card for a max price of 250 USD so build a nice extra rig with 6 cards for just 1500 and a bit more dollars.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on August 07, 2022, 09:52:31 PMQuote from: swogerino on August 07, 2022, 03:51:04 PMQuote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.It has the same performance of a AMD Rx 470/480/570/580 for most` of the coins that this card is able to mine profitably,sometimes with a nice Bios mod the Rx versions do like near 3 Mhsh more than this card in Ethash and Etchash algorithms.This clearly means that this is one of the worst cards for mining nowadays and even when it first came so it was,and it mostly geared toward gamers.For just 50-100 dollars more than the price of the 3050 you can buy the 3060 card which makes almost double the performance compared to this card.I got a few 3060 cards for under 400.three in all for 1085.they do 47+47+47= 141 mh and burn about 330 watts.I have seen a few doing just over 50 mh and 115 watts Wow ðŸ˜®Â  where are you guys getting all these cheap graphic cards? That 3060 RTX is still 520$ in my country, for 47MH per 400$ GPU is a very good price, I don't know why RTX won't go down here right now only GTX and RX cards are dirty cheap right now.

comments.author: etoque
comments.created_time: August 10, 2022, 03:21:13 AMLast edit: August 10, 2022, 04:03:41 AM by etoque
comments.body: in canada the lower I see is 379.38 usd for 3060 but the shitty model with only 1 fan lol...Price is maybe low but its not a very efficient card, I prefer buy 6700xt (474.80) same hashrate but it'll scale better with lower watt use(75w vs 115w and better cooling)for the core subject, the 3050 is to avoid lol

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on August 07, 2022, 09:52:31 PMI got a few 3060 cards for under 400.three in all for 1085.they do 47+47+47= 141 mh and burn about 330 watts.I have seen a few doing just over 50 mh and 115 watts Are you using NiceHash for those results? I just got mine recently but it's LHR v2.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on August 07, 2022, 03:51:04 PMQuote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.It has the same performance of a AMD Rx 470/480/570/580 for most` of the coins that this card is able to mine profitably,sometimes with a nice Bios mod the Rx versions do like near 3 Mhsh more than this card in Ethash and Etchash algorithms.This clearly means that this is one of the worst cards for mining nowadays and even when it first came so it was,and it mostly geared toward gamers.For just 50-100 dollars more than the price of the 3050 you can buy the 3060 card which makes almost double the performance compared to this card.Now in my country, 470/480 8 GB video cards are sold for $160. Video cards 570/580 from $200 because they are newer. 4GB versions cost about $100 and even a little cheaper. But there are less than 40 days left. In China, new 3060 Ti video cards cost from $500.

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on August 07, 2022, 09:52:31 PMQuote from: swogerino on August 07, 2022, 03:51:04 PMQuote from: Vvang on August 07, 2022, 05:47:51 AMI am looking for RTX 3050 mining performance, is anyone using this graphic card for mining any crypto coin at all.It has the same performance of a AMD Rx 470/480/570/580 for most` of the coins that this card is able to mine profitably,sometimes with a nice Bios mod the Rx versions do like near 3 Mhsh more than this card in Ethash and Etchash algorithms.This clearly means that this is one of the worst cards for mining nowadays and even when it first came so it was,and it mostly geared toward gamers.For just 50-100 dollars more than the price of the 3050 you can buy the 3060 card which makes almost double the performance compared to this card.I got a few 3060 cards for under 400.three in all for 1085.they do 47+47+47= 141 mh and burn about 330 watts.I have seen a few doing just over 50 mh and 115 watts That's cheap, I remember buying 6 gtx 1660 just to get 145MH using 400watt from the wall, silicon lottery luck on two of those cards, and it cost me 2000$ at that time, very early this year, around January of 2022... Life goes on, I hope I can see more good price like yours.
